metadata.title: USN-5835-3 -- Nova vulnerability
metadata.description: Guillaume Espanel, Pierre Libeau, Arnaud Morin, and Damien Rannou discovered that Nova incorrectly handled VMDK image processing. An authenticated attacker could possibly supply a specially crafted VMDK flat image and obtain arbitrary files from the server containing sensitive information.  Update Instructions:  Run `sudo pro fix USN-5835-3` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected by updating your system to the following package versions:  nova-api - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-common - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-xen - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-api-os-compute - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-novncproxy - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-serialproxy - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-api-os-volume - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-lxc - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-api-metadata - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-libvirt - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-kvm - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-doc - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-conductor - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-volume - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-vmware - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-cells - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-spiceproxy - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-scheduler - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-ajax-console-proxy - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-qemu - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 nova-compute-ironic - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 python3-nova - 3:25.1.0-0ubuntu1 No subscription required
